<title level="1" right="Rules">[Starting Money](/Rules.aspx?ID=1348)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 195</row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A level 0 character starts with 5 gp (50 sp) to spend on equipment.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Starting Money
